rukus.text: Ni send down vi scripture truthfully en ord al jugx among des popol en accordance kun ki DI montr vi! Vi ne flank betrayers
Vi implore DI forgiveness. DI est Forgiver Merciful
Ne argue sur behalf da those wronged their own anim; DI ne am any betrayer kulp
Ili kasx popol ne zorg kasx DI Li est them as ili haven ide Li dislikes DI EST fully aware da CXIO ILI do
Here vi est arguing their behalf en this mond; argue DI their behalf Tag Resurrection? Who est their advokat
Anyone commits evil wrongs his anim tiam implores DI forgiveness trov DI Forgiving Merciful
Anyone earns pek earns gxi detriment his own anim. DI est Omniscient SAGX
Anyone earns pek tiam akuz innocent ul thereof committed blasphemy gross offense
